section.section: Before adopting or amending a functional master plan of transportation routes and facilities in Prince George's County, the Commission shall submit its proposed plan or amendment to the district council and the County Executive for review and comment.
The district council and the County Executive have 60 days to review and provide written comments.

The adopted plan may not include a transportation route or facility unless the district council, after consulting with the County Executive, by resolution approves the inclusion of the transportation route or facility for planning purposes.

text.section: The appropriate district council may designate a functional master plan, or any amendment to a functional master plan, as an amendment to the general plan.
